patches.title: Introducing TrueView
patches.contents: Today we're adding a new feature to demo playback called TrueView. With TrueView, demo playback will match the player's original experience much more closely.Previously, demo playback showed the server's view of the world, without accounting for network latency. patches.title: Dead by Daylight dev is hiring for people with generative AI experience
patches.contents: September 18, 2025 - Responding to a request for comment, Behaviour Interactive tells PCGamesN: "We have a very firm policy that prevents the inclusion of anything generated by AI in Dead by Daylight or any other game we're working on, including marketing assets. Yes, Behaviour is exploring the use of generative AI tools to improve internal workflows; not for anything that ships in our games. Our policy isn't changing, and these job offerings are not for roles on any game team."

patches.title: Dead By Daylight dev apologizes to angry fans and promises Kill Switch overhaul
patches.contents: It's been a particularly tricky few days for Dead By Daylight - a game that is, admittedly, no stranger to bumps in the road. A couple of buggy patches and problematic perks, and criticism of Behaviour Interactive's Kill Switch system, has seen community sentiment sour despite the recent release of its The Walking Dead crossover. Now, Behaviour has issued a statement apologizing to DBD fans for the recent issues and promising a review and overhaul of the Kill Switch.

patches.title: Dead by Daylight Quality of Life Initiative 2025: Phase 1
patches.contents: Dead by Daylight will be undergoing a substantial Quality of Life Initiative, which should address many longstanding concerns and frustrations our players have been experiencing. This Initiative will take place over the course of two phases. The first runs from April to June, while the second runs from July to December. For a full look at what’s scheduled, check out the roadmap below. {STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/11814497/5bb681ab73a9a6e86f7a71bcd870c7aaeca58276.jpg To accommodate for the scope of this In

patches.title: New DBD Chapters are delayed so BHVR can fix the community's biggest problems
patches.contents: Behaviour Interactive is delaying Dead by Daylight Chapters and other content such as Rifts and Collections so it will have room to address the community's biggest complaints with the game. This is part of the DBD quality-of-life initiative for 2025, which takes aim at long-standing issues and will be split into two phases. So, while new Chapters are being pushed back, Behaviour is using this extra time to finally make the core experience much better.

Players can climb anywhere without stamina limits, but must use observation to reach tricky spots. patches.contents: When you look at the history of Warframe, 1999 certainly sticks out. Amid the theatrical space opera vibes and the high fantasy of Duviri, 1999 felt at least a little closer to home, bringing us back to a time that most will still remember. With its new update, The Old Peace, Warframe is, to quote Digital Extremes' COO Sheldon Carter, "returning to its roots," giving us a glimpse at the tenuous peace treaty that was brokered ahead of The New War (we love a bit of juxtaposition).

patches.contents: That's a wrap on TennoCon 2025! We can't thank you enough for joining us for the 10th annual TennoCon.
